response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product not only embodies cutting-edge technology but also offers unparalleled convenience and efficiency. Given its unique features and capabilities, it's valued at $12,000 to us. Considering its immense potential to enhance your daily operations or lifestyle, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional product at an exclusive price of $11,000. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 11000}
